data.name: Key
data.detailed_description:
WITTE'S STUDIO - GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1524630/KeepUp_Survival/


About the Game


Warning: This game (Key) may cause anxiety, agitation and epileptic seizures. Play only if you feel 100% physically healthy.

Key is a 4K based horror game in EGO perspective. Do you like abandoned houses? Do you like the secrets hidden behind them? Close the shutters, turn off the lights and enter the mansion.

In an adventurous way, you will explore alone an abandoned house that will test you and highlight your fears.

Your goal is to explore the mansion and find a way out, fear and anxiety will constantly accompany you.

- Contains: Jump-scares, puzzles and a quest system.

It includes save points that can be used, for example, after successfully completing a quest.

Recommendations: Play in a darkened room with slightly dim lights to better concentrate on the game and let the effects work better.

data.short_description: Key is a 4K based horror game in EGO perspective. Do you like abandoned houses? Do you like the secrets hidden behind them? Close the shutters, turn off the lights and enter the mansion. (Based on UE5)
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
